summary: Battle Pass feature testing completed successfully. All backend APIs (12/12 tests passed) and frontend UI components working correctly. New gamification system with XP progression, tier rewards, daily/weekly missions, and leaderboard fully functional.
critical_code_review_comments: BattlePass.jsx was missing data-testid attributes - FIXED: Added data-testid for battle-pass-page, xp-progress-card, battle-pass-tabs, tab-progress, tab-missions, tab-leaderboard, claim-tier-{n}, claimed-tier-{n}
Backend test file had incorrect token field name (token vs access_token) - FIXED in test file
seed_data_creation: Battle Pass progress created for test user with 5 XP (from door_knocked action)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Battle Pass feature fully tested. Backend endpoints: /api/battle-pass/season (public), /api/battle-pass/progress, /api/battle-pass/missions, /api/battle-pass/leaderboard, /api/battle-pass/rewards/{tier}/claim, /api/battle-pass/xp/award, /api/battle-pass/rewards/inventory. Frontend has 3 tabs: Tier Progress, Missions, Leaderboard. Tier 1 reward (Recruit badge) has been claimed by test user.

battle_pass_page_loads.details: Page loads with tactical gaming theme, BATTLE PASS header, Season 1: Field Commander subtitle

current_tier_and_xp_progress.details: Shows Current Tier 1 (Recruit), 5 XP Total, XP progress bar (5/1000 XP)

tier_rewards_grid.details: Displays 10 tier rewards with rarity colors (common/uncommon/rare/epic/legendary/mythic), lock icons for unreached tiers

claim_button_tier_1.details: Tier 1 reward claimed successfully, shows green checkmark and 'CLAIMED' text

missions_tab.details: Shows 5 daily missions (Door Patrol, Door Marathon, Schedule Master, Recon Duty, Field Work) with progress bars and XP rewards

leaderboard_tab.details: Shows XP Leaderboard with Test User at Rank 1 (Tier 1, Recruit, 5 XP)

navigation_battle_pass_link.details: Battle Pass link visible in sidebar navigation, navigates to /battle-pass

previous_features_working.details: Login, Dashboard, Claims list (Garden), Inspections (Recon) all working correctly

backend_api_tests.GET /api/battle-pass/season: PASS - Returns season info and 50 tiers
backend_api_tests.GET /api/battle-pass/progress: PASS - Returns user progress with XP, tier, claimed rewards
backend_api_tests.GET /api/battle-pass/missions: PASS - Returns daily and weekly missions with progress
